Others: The game between the Cleveland Guardians and Houston Astros was canceled due to rain and will not be made up.
José Ramírez had an opportunity to become Cleveland’s first 40/40/40 hitter but was denied his shot.
The Guardians finished the regular season with a record of 92-69.
The next game for the Guardians will be Oct. 5 in Game 1 of the American League Division Series.
The opponent for the Guardians could be the same Astros team, which must first advance past Detroit in the AL Wild Card series.
Ticketholders for Sunday’s game will receive a credit amount for their tickets that can be used towards a 2024 postseason game or a 2025 regular season game.
